data.title: Adaptive question generation for RLM delegation

data.body: RLM's 5 fixed questions (ENTITIES, DECISIONS, CORRECTIONS, NUMBERS, CURRENT STATE) are static. What if the questions were generated based on what the conversation is about? E.g. a recipe conversation generates 'list all ingredients with exact quantities' instead of generic 'list all numbers.' Use a cheap pre-pass to classify the conversation domain, then select from a question bank. Zero extra compute overhead if the classifier is rule-based.
